casebody.data:
Arthur CORKUM, Respondent, v. PANAMA RAILROAD COMPANY, Appellant. No. 39. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Oct. 19, 1936. Thomas J. Maginnis, of New York City, for appellant. Paul C. Matthews, of New York City (Archibald F. McGrath, of New York City, of counsel), for respondent.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed on the authority of Fairmount Glass Works v. Cub Fork Coal Co., 287 U.S. 474, 53 S.Ct. 252, 77 L.Ed. 439.
